tuv.seg: Tax relief for drivers and passengers with disabilities
Díoluine cánach do do thiománaithe agus do phaisinéirí faoi mhíchumas

The Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Scheme provides a range of tax reliefs linked to the purchase and use of specially constructed or adapted vehicles by drivers and passengers with a disability

Cuireann an Scéim Tiománaithe faoi Mhíchumas agus Paisinéirí faoi Mhíchumas réimse faoisimh cánach ar fáil atá ceangailte le ceannach agus le húsáid feithiclí i gcomhair tiománaithe faoi mhíchumas agus paisinéirí faoi mhíchumas
The rules of the scheme are set out in the Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers (Tax Concessions) Regulations 1994 (SI 353/1994) as amended
Tá téarmaí na scéime leagtha amach sna Rialacháin um Thiománaithe Míchumasaithe agus Paisinéirí Míchumasaithe (Lamháltais Chánach) 1994 (I.R

Under the terms of the scheme, you can claim remission or repayment of vehicle registration tax (VRT), repayment of value-added tax (VAT) on the purchase of a vehicle and repayment of VAT on the cost of adapting a vehicle

353/1994) arna leasú. Faoi théarmaí na scéime, is féidir leat loghadh nó aisíocaíocht a éileamh ar do Cháin Chláraithe Feithiclí (CCF), aisíocaíocht a éileamh ar cháin bhreisluacha (CBL) maidir le ceannach feithicle, agus aisíocaíocht CBL a éileamh ar an gcostas a bhaineann le feithicil a oiriúnú
In addition, if you qualify under the scheme, your vehicle may be exempt from the payment of annual motor tax on application to a Motor Tax Office
Chomh maith leis sin, má tá tú cáilithe faoin scéim, seans go bhfaighidh tú go bhfuil d’fheithicil díolmhaithe ó mhótarcháin bhliantúil a íoc nuair a dhéanfar iarratas chuig an Oifig Mótarchánach

Since January 2015, if you qualify for tax relief under the scheme you are also eligible for a fuel grant under the Disabled Drivers and Disabled Passengers Fuel Grant Regulations 2015 (SI 635/2015 (pdf))

Ó mhí Eanáir 2015 ar aghaidh, aon duine atá cáilithe le haghaidh faoiseamh cánach faoin scéim, tá siad i dteideal deontas breosla faoi na Rialacháin an Deontais Bhreosla um Thiománaithe Míchumasaithe agus Paisinéirí Míchumasaithe 2015 (IR 635/2015 (pdf))
The grant replaced the repayment of excise duty on fuel
Is ann don deontas seo anois in áit aisíocaíocht dleachta máil ar bhreosla
The rate of grant payable per litre, up to a maximum of 2,730 litres per calendar year, is as follows:
Is é seo a leanas ráta an deontais ata iníoctha in aghaidh an lítir, suas go huasmhéid 2,730 lítir in aon bhliain féilire:
An adapted vehicle driven by a driver with a disability is entitled to exemption from toll road fees
Tá feithicil oiriúnaithe a bhíonn á tiomáint ag tiománaí faoi mhíchumas i dteideal díolúine ó tháillí bóthar dola
Toll road operators issue special passes which are recognised by all other toll road operators and which allow such vehicles pass through the tolls without paying
Eisíonn oibreoirí bóthar dola pasanna speisialta a dtugann na hoibreoir go léir bóthar dola aitheantas orthu agus a ligeann do na feithiclí sin dul trí na dolaí gan íoc
To obtain a special pass apply to your nearest toll road operator
Chun pas speisialta a fháil, déan iarratas chuig an oibreoir bóthar dola is cóngaraí duit
Changes to Scheme in 2016
Athruithe ar an Scéim in 2016
A number of changes have been made to the Scheme. They include:
Rinneadh roinnt mhaith athruithe ar an Scéim, na cinn seo a leanas san áireamh:
• The limit on the vehicle’s engine size of less than 2,000cc in the case of a driver and 4,000cc in the case of a passenger has been increased to 6,000cc for drivers and passengers
• Tá méadú tar éis teacht ar uasmhéid inneall na feithicle ó 2,000cc i gcás an tiománaí agus ó 4,000cc i gcás an phaisinéara go 6,000cc sa dá chás
• The maximum amount of VRT and VAT relief available under the Scheme has being increased from €9,525 to €10,000 for drivers and from €15,875 to €16,000 for passengers
• Tá méadú tar éis teacht ar an méid faoisimh CCF agus CBL atá ar fáil faoin Scéim ó €9,525 go €10,000 i gcás tiománaithe agus ó €15,875 go €16,000 i gcás paisinéirí
• A new category of specifically adapted vehicle for drivers with severe disabilities where the vehicle needs significant adaptation
• Is ann anois do chatagóir nua feithicle ar a ndéantar oiriúnú go speisialta le haghaidh tiománaithe faoi mhíchumas trom, áit a mbíonn an-chuid oiriúnú ag teastáil ar an bhfeithicil
The maximum amount of VRT and VAT relief available for this category is €16,000 and the vehicle must be retained for 3 years
Is é €16,000 uasmhéid an CCG agus CBL atá ar fáil don chatagóir seo agus ní mór an fheithicil a choimeád ar feadh 3 bliana
• A new category of extensively adapted vehicle for drivers and passengers where the cost of the required adaptions exceeds the open market selling price of the vehicle being adapted

• Is ann anois do chatagóir nua feithicle ar a ndéantar mór-oiriúnú le haghaidh tiománaithe agus paisinéirí áit a bhaineann costas níos mó leis na hoiriúnuithe atá ag teastáil ná a bhaineann le praghas díola na feithicle atá le hoiriúnú ar an margadh oscailte
The maximum amount of VRT and VAT relief available for this category is €22,000 and the vehicle must be retained for 6 years
Is é €22,000 uasmhéid an CCG agus CBL atá ar fáil don chatagóir seo agus ní mór an fheithicil a choimeád ar feadh 6 bliana
• Vehicles no longer have to be purchased from an authorised motor dealer
• Ní gá a thuilleadh go gceannaítear feithiclí ó dhéileálaithe údaraithe mótar
In order to qualify for tax relief under the scheme, the person with a disability must have a valid Primary Medical Certificate
Chun a bheith i dteideal díolúine ó cháin faoin scéim, caithfidh tú Teastas Príomhúil Leighis dlistineach a bheith agat
A Primary Medical Certificate confirms you are severely and permanently disabled and:
Caithfidh tú a bheith faoi mhíchumas tromchúiseach agus buan agus
• Are completely or almost completely without the use of both legs or
• A bheith gan úsáid nó beagnach gan úsáid do dhá chois
• Are completely without the use of one of your legs and almost completely without the use of the other leg to the extent that you are severely restricted as regards movement in your legs or
• A bheith go hiomlán gan úsáid chos amháin agus beagnach go hiomlán gan úsáid an chos eile go dtí an pointe go bhfuil an-bhac ort maidir le gluaiseacht i do chosa
• Are without both hands or both arms or
• A bheith gan ceachtar lámh nó bacán láimhe
• Are without one or both legs or
• A bheith gan cos amháin nó an dá chos
• Are completely or almost completely without the use of both hands or arms and completely or almost completely without the use of one leg or
• A bheith go hiomlán nó beagnach go hiomlán gan úsáid an dá lámh nó bacán láimhe agus go hiomlán nó beagnach go hiomlán gan úsáid cos amháin
• Have the medical condition of dwarfism and serious difficulties of movement of the legs
• An galar abhcachas a bheith ort agus deacrachtaí suntasacha a bheith agat le gluaiseacht na gcos
Local Health Offices of the Health Service Executive (HSE) process applications for a Primary Medical Certificate
Próiseálann Oifigí Sláinte Áitiúla d’Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) iarratas ar Theastas Míochaine Príomhúla

If the HSE refuses your application for a Primary Medical Certificate, you may appeal the refusal to the Disabled Drivers Medical Board of Appeal, National Rehabilitation Hospital, Rochestown Avenue, Dun Laoghaire, Co

Má dhiúltaíonn FSS d’iarratas ar Theastas Míochaine Príomhúla, is féidir leat an diúltú a achomharc chuig Board Míochaine Achomhairc de chuid na dTiománaithe faoi Mhíchumais, An tOspidéal Náisiúnta Athshlánaithe, Ascaill Bhaile an Róistigh, Co
You can claim tax relief on
Is féidir leat díolúine cánach a éileamh ar:
• A used vehicle that has not been previously registered in the state
• Feithicil a baineadh úsáid as cheana nach raibh cláraithe sa stáit seo cheana
You can also buy a previously registered used vehicle, in which case the amount of the repayment will be the residual VAT contained in the value of the vehicle
Chomh maith leis sin, is féidir leat feithicil athláimhe a cláraíodh cheana féin a cheannach
However, the majority of used vehicles purchased from a dealer are purchased under the Margin Scheme
Sa chás sin, ní bheidh san aisíocaíocht ach an CBL iarmharach a bhaineann le luach na feithicle
This means that no VAT is payable when the vehicle is purchased and therefore no VAT is refundable
Ach i gcás fhormhór na bhfeithiclí a cheannaítear ó dhéileálaithe, ceannaítear faoin Scéim Chorlaigh iad
If you bought the vehicle before you qualified as a disabled driver, a repayment of VAT and VRT, appropriate to the market value of the vehicle at the time of entry to the scheme, will be made
Is é is ciall leis sin ná nach mbíonn CBL le híoc nuair a cheannaítear an fheithicil agus mar sin níl aon CBL le haisíoc
A vehicle that has been acquired under a hire-purchase agreement qualifies for tax relief
Má cheannaigh tú an carr roimh duit a theacht faoin teideal tiomanaí faoi mhíchumas, déanfar aisíoc CBL agus CCF, de réir luach margadh an fheithicil ag an am ar tháinig tú isteach faoin scéim
You can claim tax relief on
Is féidir leat díolúine cánach a éileamh ar:
• A used vehicle that has not been previously registered in the State
• Feithicil a baineadh úsáid as cheana nach raibh cláraithe sa stáit seo cheana
You can also buy a previously registered used vehicle, in which case the amount of the repayment will be the residual VAT contained in the value of the vehicle
Chomh maith leis sin, is féidir leat feithicil athláimhe a cláraíodh cheana féin a cheannach. Sa chás sin, ní bheidh san aisíocaíocht ach an CBL iarmharach a bhaineann le luach na feithicle
However, the majority of used vehicles purchased from a dealer are purchased under the Margin Scheme
Ach i gcás fhormhór na bhfeithiclí a cheannaítear ó dhéileálaithe, ceannaítear faoin Scéim Chorlaigh iad
This means that no VAT is payable when the vehicle is purchased and therefore no VAT is refundable
Is é is ciall leis sin ná nach mbíonn CBL le híoc nuair a cheannaítear an fheithicil agus mar sin níl aon CBL le haisíoc
If you bought the vehicle before you qualified as a disabled person, a repayment of VAT and VRT, appropriate to the market value of the vehicle at the time of entry to the scheme, will be made
Má cheannaigh tú an carr roimh duit a theacht faoin teideal duine faoi mhíchumas, déanfar aisíoc CBL agus CCF leat, de réir luach margadh an fheithicil ag an am ar tháinig tú isteach faoin scéim

If you buy a used vehicle that has previously qualified for tax relief under the scheme for transporting disabled passengers and where the original adaptions remain in place when you buy it, it is eligible for the scheme

Má cheannaíonn tú feithicil a úsáidtear go bhfuil cáilithe le haghaidh faoisimh chánach roimhe sin faoin scéim le haghaidh iompar paisinéirí faoi mhíchumas agus tá na oiriúnuithe bunaidh fós san fheithicil nuair a cheannaíonn tú é, tá sé incháilithe don scéim
A vehicle that has been acquired under a hire-purchase agreement qualifies for tax relief
Tá feithicil a ceannaíodh faoi aontú cíos-cheannach i dteideal díolúine cánach

A family member of a disabled passenger can also qualify for relief provided they are living with and responsible for the transport of the disabled person in question and has acquired the vehicle for that purpose

Is féidir le duine de chlann phaisinéir faoi mhíchumas a bheith i dteideal díolúine freisin chomh fada is go bhfuil sé/sí ag maireachtáil le, agus freagrach as córas iompar a chur ar fáil, don duine faoi mhíchumas agus go bhfuil an feithicil faighte aige ina chomhair seo
If the disabled person only stays with a family member on a part-time basis, the residency requirement is not met
Muna bhfuil an duine faoi mhíchumas ag fanacht le duine dá c(h)lann ach ar bhonn páirt-aimsireach, ní chastar leis an gcoinníoll maidir le cónaí

However, if the disabled person is a minor who is in residential or medical care on a part-time or occasional basis and who spends a significant part of their time at home, for example, every weekend and holidays, the residency requirement may be met
Más mionaoiseach atá sa duine faoi mhíchumas áfach, agus go mbíonn sé/sí in ionad cónaithe/ sláinte ar bhunús páirtaimseartha ach go gcaitheann sé/sí cuid mhór dá c(h)uid ama sa mbaile, m.sh
The Revenue Commissioners may, in exceptional circumstances, waive the residency requirement
deireadh seachtainí agus laethanta saoire, b'fhéidir go sásódh sé seo an coinníoll
You should contact the Central Repayments Office to make sure that you meet the residency requirements for relief under the scheme before purchasing a vehicle
Ba cheart duit dul i dteangmháil leis an Oifig Lárnach Aisíocaíochtaí chun a chinntiú go sásaíonn tú na coinníollacha cónaithe don scéim roimh duit feithicil a cheannacht
"Disposal" means the sale of the vehicle, the gift of the vehicle to another person and the hiring or renting of the vehicle
Is é is ciall le "diúscairt/cur de láimh" na feithicle ná í a dhíol, a thabhairt mar bhronntanas do dhuine eile, nó a ligeann amach ar cíos
The vehicle must not be disposed of for at least 2 years from the date the relief is granted
Ní féidir an fheithicil a chur de láimh laistigh de 2 bhliain ar a laghad ón dáta a tugadh an faoiseamh
The retention period is 3 years for a specifically adapted vehicle and 6 years for an extensively adapted vehicle
Baineann tréimhse coinneála 3 bliana i gcás feithiclí ar a ndéantar oiriúnú go speisialta agus 6 bliana i gcás feithiclí ar a ndéantar mór-oiriúnú

You will only be allowed to dispose of the vehicle within the retention period if you refund to the Revenue Commissioners a substantial portion of the relief allowed, calculated by reference to the value of the vehicle at the time of disposal

Ní thabharfar cead duit an fheithicil a chur de láimh laistigh den tréimhse coinneála ach amháin má aisíocann tú do na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim cuid mhór den fhaoiseamh a ceadaíodh, bunaithe ar luach an fheithicil ag an am atá sí á cur de láimh
If the vehicle is disposed of following damage in an accident, the damage will be taken into account in calculating the value of the vehicle at the time of disposal
Má chuirtear an fheithicil de láimh tar éis go ndearnadh damáiste di i dtimpiste, cuirfear an damáiste sin san áireamh agus luach an fheithicil á mheas ag am a diúscartha
Download and complete Form DD1 (pdf)
Tá Fhoirm DD1 le fail anseo freisin (pdf)
Applying for remission of VRT
Ag déanamh iarratas ar aisíoc CCF
You need to send the following documents to the Central Repayments Office
Ní mór duit na cáipéisí seo a leanas a sheoladh chuig an Oifig Lárnach Aisíocaíochtaí
• The original Primary Medical Certificate if you are claiming for the first time
• An Teastas Míochaine Príomhúla bhunaidh má tá ag éileamh don chéad uair
You must apply to the Health Service Executive (HSE) for an application form for a Primary Medical Certificate – obtain an application form from your Local Health Office in the HSE
Ní mór duit iarratas a dhéanamh chuig do Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) d'fhoirm iarratais ar Theastas Míochaine Príomhúla - faigh foirm iarratais ó d'Oifig Sláinte Áitiúla i FSS
Complete the application form and return it to the Senior Medical Officer of the Local Health Office
Líon isteach an fhoirm iarratais agus seol ar ais í chuig an tOifigeach Míochaine Sinsearaí den Oifig Sláinte Áitiúla
You will then receive an appointment for an assessment of the level of your disability
Gheobhaidh tú ansin coinne le measúnú ar an leibhéal de do mhíchumas
If you satisfy the requirements, you are granted a Primary Medical Certificate by the HSE
Má chomhlíonann tú na díotha, bronnann FSS Teastas Míochaine Príomhúla ort
If your application for remission of VRT is acceptable, you will be sent a Letter of Authorisation which authorises you to purchase a vehicle
Má ghlactar le d’iarratas ar lamháil VRT, seolfar Litir Údaraithe chuig a thugann an chumhacht duit feithicil a cheannach
When you have chosen the vehicle, the vehicle identification number (VIN) must be submitted to the Central Repayments Office on the form issued to you with the Letter of Authorisation
Agus an fheithicil roghnaithe agat, ní mór uimhir aitheantais na feithicle (VIN) a chur isteach chuig an Lároifig Aisíocaíochtaí ar an bhfoirm a eisíodh chugat leis an Litir Údaraithe
You will be issued with an Exemption Notification that allows the vehicle to be registered exempt of VRT at the NCTS centre
Eiseofar Fógra Díolúine chugat a thugann cead an fheithicil a chlárú gan VRT ag an ionad NCTS
When you have bought the vehicle, you must obtain the following documents
Nuair atá an feithicil ceannaithe agat ní mór duit na cáipéisí seo a leanas a fháil
• An original invoice from the dealer showing the full purchase particulars of the vehicle and verifying that payment of the amount due has been made in full
• Bunshonrasc ón díoltóir ag léiriú na sonraí ar fad maidir le ceannacht an fheithicil agus ag dearbhú gur íocadh as ina iomlán
• An original invoice from the person who adapted the vehicle, showing that payment has been made in full
• Bunshonrasc ón té a rinne athchóiriú ar an bhfeithicil, ag taispeáint gur íocadh go hiomlán as an obair
The invoice must show full details of the adaptations to the vehicle and the VAT charged
Ní mór mionsonraí a bheith ar an sonrasc maidir leis na hathruithe a déanadh ar an feithicil agus an CBL a baineadh amach
• A new vehicle that is adapted requires an Individual Vehicle Approval (IVA) certificate from the National Standards Authority of Ireland (NSAI)
• Éilíonn ar fheithicil nua atá curtha in oiriúint le Ceadú Feithiclí Aonair (IVA) deimhniú ón Údarás um Chaighdeáin Náisiúnta na hÉireann (NSAI)
To register the vehicle at the NCTS centre the dealer must submit these documents, along with the Letter of Authorisation, the Exemption Notification and the completed Form DD1
Chun an fheithicil a chlárú ag an ionad NCTS ní mór don díoltóir na cáipéisí seo a chur isteach, chomh maith leis an Litir Údaraithe, an Fógra Díolúine agus an Fhoirm DD1 chomhlánaithe
If the documentation is in order, the NCTS will register the vehicle without charging VRT
Má tá an cháipéisíocht i gceart, cláróidh an NCTS an fheithicil gan chostas VRT a ghearradh

When the vehicle is registered, to obtain a repayment of the VAT the dealer should submit the Letter of Authorisation, the Exemption Notification and the invoices mentioned above to the Central Repayments Office

Nuair atá an fheithicil cláraithe, chun aisíocaíocht VAT a fháil ba cheart don díoltóir an Litir Údaraithe, an Fógra Díolúine agus na sonraisc a luadh thuas a chuir isteach chuig an Lároifig Aisíocaíochtaí
Applying for repayment of VRT and VAT
Ag déanamh iarratas ar aisíoc CCF agus CBL
If VRT has not been remitted and you want to claim repayment of VRT and VAT, you need to submit the following documents to the Central Repayments Office
Muna ndearnadh aisíoc ar an CCF agus go bhfuil tú ag iarraidh aisíoc CCF agus CBL a éileamh, ní mór duit iad seo a leanas a sheoladh chuig an Oifig Lárnach Aisíocaíochtaí
• A fully completed Application Form DD1
• Foirm Iarratais DD1 líonta mar is cuí
• The original Primary Medical Certificate if you are claiming for the first time
• An bunchóip den Teastas Príomhúil Leighis má tá tú ag éileamh don chéad uair
• An original invoice from the dealer showing the full purchase particulars of the vehicle and VAT charged and showing that payment of the amount due has been made in full
• Bunshonrasc ón ndíoltóir ag léiriú na sonraí ar fad maidir le ceannacht an fheithicil agus an CBL a baineadh amach agus ag dearbhú gur íocadh as ina iomlán
• An original invoice from the person who adapted the vehicle, indicating that payment has been made in full
• Bunshonrasc ón té a rinne athchóiriú ar an bhfeithicil, ag taispeáint gur íocadh go hiomlán as an obair
This invoice should set out the full details of the adaptations and the VAT charged
Ní mór mionsonraí a bheith ar an sonrasc maidir leis na hathruithe a déanadh ar an feithicil agus an CBL a baineadh amach
• The vehicle's Vehicle Registration Certificate
• Teastas Clárú Feithicil an fheithicil

If the vehicle has been registered before, there is no need to go through the usual change of ownership procedure as this will automatically happen when the vehicle is taxed exempt at the Motor Tax Office

Más rud é go raibh an fheithicil cláraithe cheana, ní gá dul tríd an ngnáthghnáthamh d’athrú úinéireachta mar tarlóidh sé seo go huathoibríoch nuair atá an fheithicil díolmhaithe ó cháin ag an Oifig Mótarchánach
If your claim is accepted you are issued with a Certificate of Approval by the Central Repayments Office which you should submit to your local Motor Tax Office
Má ghlactar le d’éileamh eisíonn an Lároifig Aisíocaíochtaí Teastas Formheasa chugat agus ba cheart duit é seo a chur isteach chuig d’Oifig Mótarchánach áitiúil

You will be issued with a new Vehicle Registration Certificate which you should send to the Central Repayments Office where it will be endorsed to the effect that the vehicle was purchased under the Disabled Drivers and Passengers Scheme and cannot be disposed of for two years

Eiseofar Teastas Cláraithe Feithicle nua chugat agus ba cheart duit é seo a sheoladh chuig an Lárionad Aisíocaíochtaí, áit inar ndéanfar é a fhormhuiniú ag rá go raibh an fheithicil ceannaithe faoin Scéim um Paisinéirí agus Tiománaithe faoi Mhíchumas agus nach féidir fáil réidh leis ar feadh dhá bhliain
This certificate will be returned to you immediately
Seolfar an teastas seo ar ais chugat láithreach
If the vehicle has previously qualified for tax relief under the scheme, the maximum amount of tax relief that can be claimed for the vehicle will probably have already been claimed
Má tá an fheithicil cáilithe roimhe sin le haghaidh faoisimh chánach faoin scéim, beidh an t-uasmhéid faoisimh cánach is féidir a éileamh i leith na feithicle is dócha a bheith á éileamh cheana féin
However, you should still submit form DD1 with all the required documentation as listed above
Mar sin féin, tá tú fós a chur isteach DD1 foirm le doiciméadú riachtanach go léir mar atá liostaithe thuas
Applying for exemption from motor tax
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar an deontas breosla
Since January 2015, members of the scheme are eligible for a fuel grant which is paid 12 months in arrears
Ó Eanáir 2015 i leith, tá comhaltaí na scéime incháilithe chun deontas breosla a fháil a íoctar i riaráistí 12 mhí
You should continue the practice of keeping receipts for the fuel purchased for 2 years, but do not have to submit them when you apply for the fuel grant

Ba cheart duit leanúint leis an gcleachtas ina gcoimeádann tú fáltais don bhreosla a ceannaíodh ar feadh 2 bhliain, ach níl ort na fáltais a sheoladh ar aghaidh nuair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar an deontas breosla
You have to estimate the percentage of the fuel that is used for your own transport or the transport of a disabled passenger
Tá ort céatadán an bhreosla a úsáidtear do d’iompar féin nó d’iompar paisinéara faoi mhíchumas a mheas
You can claim your fuel grant for 2015 from January 2016 using Revenue's online service myAccount
Féadfaidh tú do dheontas breosla le haghaidh na bliana 2015 a éileamh ó Eanáir 2016 ar aghaidh agus seirbhís ar líne moChuntas (‘myAccount’) na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim á húsáid
To register on myAccount you need your PPS number, mobile or landline number, email address and home address
Chun clárú ar moChuntas, teastaíonn d’uimhir PSP, uimhir ghuthán póca nó líne thalún, seoladh ríomhphoist agus do sheoladh baile
If you do not have internet access you can contact the Revenue Commissioners, Forms & Leaflets Section on 1890 306 706 and request a paper form
Mura bhfuil rochtain idirlín agat, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le Rannóg Foirmeacha agus Bileoga Faisnéise na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim trí ghlao ar 1890 306 706 agus foirm pháipéir a iarraidh
The fuel grant is paid directly into your bank account so you have to provide details of the account into which you wish it to be paid
